title: html/template: block inside title causes memory leak
body:
### What version of Go are you using?
go1.7

### What operating system and processor architecture are you using?
linux/amd64

### What did you do?
Defining a block between `<title>`-tags defines new templates when Executing the template.
See: 
https://play.golang.org/p/mDvyONhj6A


### What did you expect to see?
* Unchanged list of defined templates, as seen with text/template:
https://play.golang.org/p/QMmQTsjkxA
* behaviour like with any other tag except `<title>`:
https://play.golang.org/p/um4OqNRX3s
* No additional memory consumption

### What did you see instead?
Added templates with names like `titletext$htmltemplate_stateRCDATA_elementTitle$htmltemplate_stateRCDATA_elementTitle`
Slowly fill up system memory
